name: Personal Data
definition: Any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person

name: Special Categories of Personal Data
definition: Data revealing racial/ethnic origin, political opinions, religious beliefs, trade union membership, genetic data, biometric data for ID, health data, sex life/orientation data

name: Health Data
definition: Data relating to the health status of an individual

name: Biometric Data
definition: Personal data resulting from specific technical processing relating to physical, physiological or behavioural characteristics

name: Genetic Data
definition: Personal data relating to the genetic characteristics of an individual

name: Racial/Ethnic Origin Data
definition: Data revealing racial or ethnic origin of an individual

name: Political Opinion Data
definition: Data revealing political opinions of an individual

name: Religious/Philosophical Belief Data
definition: Data revealing religious or philosophical beliefs

name: Trade Union Data
definition: Data relating to trade union membership

name: Sex Life/Sexual Orientation Data
definition: Data relating to sex life or sexual orientation

name: Children's Personal Data
definition: Personal data of individuals under 16 years old

name: Sensitive Personal Data
definition: Personal data requiring special protection and restricted processing

name: Personally Identifiable Information
definition: Any data that can directly identify an individual

name: Quasi-Identifying Data
definition: Data that can indirectly identify when combined with other information
